category: Evaluation Committee Regulations/Article 5 (Appointment of Committee Members)
contents: Article 5 (Appointment of Committee Members) ① The chairman is appointed by the chairman with the consent of the board of directors. Revised April 3, 2017, January 31, 2019. ② The vice chairperson is elected from among the members. ③ Members are appointed by the Chairman as experts with extensive expertise and experience in the subject of evaluation and evaluation, such as personnel from government ministries and related public institutions, Gyeonggi officials, accountants, and lawyers. However, external members must account for more than two-thirds of all members. ④ Committee members must strive to ensure that the ratio of specific genders does not exceed 70% of the registered members. Newly established 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 2. 11.
